scripts.start: echo "We recommend using Deno. Use deno.json (deno i && deno task dev) or a different runtime via 'start:node' or 'start:bun' "
scripts.start:node: npm run build && cd env && NODE_COMPILE_CACHE=~/.node_cache node ../dist/main.js
scripts.start:bun: npm run build && cd env && bun --bun --optimize --smol ../dist/main.js
